name: The Café
description:
Welcome to the new simulaton game: The Café

In this game, you need to serve orders in time.

* Go to the kitchen to cook / prepare some foods / drinks and serve orders. *

* Some foods / drinks have preparing / cooking time.

-- Credits --

- CoffeeShop Starter Pack by PUZZLED WIZARD

- Easter GUI by  PONETI

- TGU Skybox Pack by BABYCAKE STUDIO

- Music - Fun & Games by SD SOUND TRACKS

Controls

- Press WASD keys to move the character.

- Left click to pickup foods and drinks.

- Press Enter to serve order.

- Press E to open / close doors.

- Press Space to jump.

- Press 1, 2, 3 (Alphanumeric) keys to delete foods or drinks.

- Press ESC to pause the game.

Foods / Drinks

- Black Donut / White Donut / Pink Donut

- Chocolate chips cupcake

- Strawberry cupcake

- Oreo cupcake

- Red velvet cupcake

- Blueberry cheesecake

- Lime cheesecake

- Chocolate cheesecake

- Strawberry cheesecake

- Croissant

- French toasts

- Teas

- Coffee

- Orange juice

- Lemonade

- Cookie

And... There is a Shop in this game. You can buy things in the Shop. (More things will be added soon.)

* You can change Mouse sensitivity and Music volume in the pause menu.

* To hide UI, press CTRL and H at the same time and release at the same time.
